record.title: PERMISSION TO REDUCE TIME FOR ELECTRONIC VOTING DURING FURTHER CONSIDERATION OF H.R. 3161

speaking-unknown-id.title: Ms.
speaking-unknown-id.name: DeLAURO
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that, during further consideration of H.R. 3161 pursuant to House Resolution 581 and House Resolution 599, the Chair may reduce to 2 minutes the minimum time for electronic voting under clause 6 of rule XVIII and clauses 8 and 9 of rule XX.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from Connecticut?
